body_html: Can you add a trivial 1x1, stride 1 conv at the end so that there is always a conv following every batch norm? Is there a reason you put the bn's after the conv's? The usual idea is that the bn's precondition the batch to have nice statistics before applying conv.
body_text: Can you add a trivial 1x1, stride 1 conv at the end so that there is always a conv following every batch norm? Is there a reason you put the bn's after the conv's? The usual idea is that the bn's precondition the batch to have nice statistics before applying conv.
body: Can you add a trivial 1x1, stride 1 conv at the end so that there is always a conv following every batch norm? Is there a reason you put the bn's after the conv's? The usual idea is that the bn's precondition the batch to have nice statistics before applying conv.
